description: Standard form used by sellers to make counter offers to buyers' offers or counter offers
usageNotes: This form is used when a seller wants to counter an offer from the buyer. It modifies specific terms of the original offer while accepting others. Multiple counter offers may be exchanged during negotiations.
legalNotes: This form has been approved by the California Association of REALTORSÂ® (C.A.R.). Time is of the essence. All counter offers expire by law after a reasonable time if no expiration is specified.
